lead_paragraph: The London Jewish Museum of Art, created in 2001, has obtained a previously unknown 1945 gouache made by Marc Chagall in direct response to the Holocaust.

keywords.value: London Jewish Museum of Art (Ben Uri Gallery)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: The London Jewish Museum of Art, created in 2001, has obtained a previously unknown 1945 gouache made by Marc Chagall in direct response to the Holocaust.

headline.main: Small Museum Captures a Rare Chagall
